price: 16. Hinnak Yalli gineemik say-xayló haysitaah, siinih lab-xaylo dooree a-korosey?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil-banīna
